items.title: ScanBot
items.description: ScanBot is a novel dataset designed for instruction-conditioned, high-precision surface scanning in robotic systems.

items.title: MoXpert
items.description: A multi expert framework named MoXpert to enhance the capabilities of multimodal large language models (MLLMs) in indusrial anomaly detection.

items.title: Clip2Safety
items.description: An interpretable visionâ€“language detection framework is proposed to enable reliable and real-time PPE compliance monitoring across heterogeneous workplace scenarios.

items.title: A multi-expert framework for enhancing multimodal large language models in industrial anomaly detection
items.description: A multi expert framework named MoXpert to enhance the capabilities of multimodal large language models (MLLMs) in indusrial anomaly detection.

items.title: Zero-Shot Anomaly Detection in Laser Powder Bed Fusion Using Multimodal RAG and Large Language Models
items.description: A multimodal RAG framework is proposed to automate anomaly detection in additive manufacturing (AM) without relying on task-specific training data.
items.authors: **Authors:** Kiarash Naghavi Khanghah, **Zhiling Chen**, Lela Romeo, Qian Yang, Rajiv Malhotra, Farhad Imani, Hongyi Xu

items.title: Privacy-preserving decentralized federated learning via explainable adaptive differential privacy
items.description: A privacy-accountable and explainable decentralized federated learning framework is introduced by integrating HyperDimensional computing with an explicit differential privacy noise accountant.
items.authors: **Authors:** Fardin Jalil Piran, **Zhiling Chen**, Yang Zhang, Qianyu Zhou, Jiong Tang, Farhad Imani

items.title: Can multimodal large language models be guided to improve industrial anomaly detection?
items.description: We propose Echo, a novel multi-expert framework designed to enhance MLLM performance for industrial anomaly detection.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zhiling Chen**, Hanning Chen, Mohsen Imani, Farhad Imani

items.title: ScanBot: Towards Intelligent Surface Scanning in Embodied Robotic Systems
items.description: We introduce ScanBot, a novel dataset designed for instruction-conditioned, high-precision surface scanning in robotic systems.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zhiling Chen**, Yang Zhang, Fardin Jalil Piran, Qianyu Zhou, Jiong Tang, Farhad Imani

items.title: Federated Hyperdimensional Computing for hierarchical and distributed quality monitoring in smart manufacturing
items.description: A communication-efficient federated learning framework based on Hyperdimensional Computing is introduced for hierarchical and non-IID smart manufacturing data at the edge.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zhiling Chen**, Danny Hoang, Fardin Jalil Piran, Ruimin Chen, Farhad Imani

items.title: Multimodal RAG-driven Anomaly Detection and Classification in Laser Powder Bed Fusion using Large Language Models
items.description: A multimodal RAG framework is proposed to automate anomaly detection in additive manufacturing (AM) without relying on task-specific training data.
items.authors: **Authors:** Kiarash Naghavi Khanghah, **Zhiling Chen**, Lela Romeo, Qian Yang, Rajiv Malhotra, Farhad Imani, Hongyi Xu

items.title: Privacy-preserving federated learning with differentially private hyperdimensional computing
items.description: A noise-accountable and explainable federated learning framework is introduced to enable privacy-preserving lifelong learning in IoT systems.
items.authors: **Authors:** Fardin Jalil Piran, **Zhiling Chen**, Mohsen Imani, Farhad Imani

items.title: Vision language model for interpretable and fine-grained detection of safety compliance in diverse workplaces
items.description: An interpretable visionâ€“language detection framework is proposed to enable reliable and real-time PPE compliance monitoring across heterogeneous workplace scenarios.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zhiling Chen**, Hanning Chen, Mohsen Imani, Ruimin Chen, Farhad Imani

items.title: Few-Shot Visual Reasoning for Wind Turbine Blade Damage Detection via RAG with Vision-Language Model
items.description: A visualâ€“text retrieval-augmented visionâ€“language framework is introduced for few-shot reasoning in wind turbine blade inspection.
items.authors: **Authors:** Qianyu Zhou, Yang Zhang, **Zhiling Chen**, Fardin Jalil Piran, Farhad Imani, Jiong Tang

items.title: Distributed hyperdimensional computing for real-time data aggregation and interpretable quality monitoring in manufacturing
items.description: A distributed hyperdimensional computing framework is introduced for interpretable multi-sensor learning in manufacturing.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zhiling Chen**, Danny Hoang, Ruimin Chen, Farhad Imani

items.school: Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology

items.title: Software Engineering Intern
items.description: Developed a real-time UI system for a 7-inch touchscreen (3 windows: initialization, balancing, monitoring),enabling intuitive operation and dynamic visualization of vibration/rotation signals.
